message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can work from there.
You took 90% last round, I'm offering you 40% this time. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise, but 40% is too low.  Let's split it 55/45.  I think this is a fair offer considering the inflation.
I'm not sure 55% is fair, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. 50/50 is a fair split, don't you think?
